title: Roxy's caramelised fruits with a Grand Marnier cream
steps: Put the butter and sugar in a small, heavy-bottomed frying pan. Heat gently, stirring all the while.
When the sugar has nearly melted, add the fruit. Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the fruit is soft and caramelised.
Meanwhile, stir the Grand Marnier into the cream. Serve the fruit with a spoon of cream and top with a sprinkling of orange zest.
